text:
Music Theory My Way is a website designed for people with dyslexia and can be customised in different ways to suit your learning style.

This tour will show you what the different sections of the website are for.

altText: Icon of a laptop and tablet
text: It is possible to use Music Theory My Way on a mobile phone screen, but a tablet or laptop screen is better.

You will be learning about music theory up to grade 2. The green music notes icon takes you to the learning section.

It would be useful to have a pencil and paper to hand for some of the content.

There will be some new words to learn, and they will be explained along the way.

You can look up any words you're not sure about in the glossary by clicking the red button.
You will be covering lots of different topics, and the <emph>purple quiz</emph> button will take you to a 10-question quiz based on the topics you've covered so far.

The orange settings button will take you to a screen where you can update your background colour, font and other aspects of the way information is presented.

We suggest that you go and investigate the settings after the tour.
To come back to the <emph>tour</emph> at any time, click the <emph>yellow question mark</emph> from the home page.
